attributes.action: Make UK human survival a number one priority in the face of fossil fuel depletion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in a world of huge energy use. The capitalist world has at it's basis a reliance on relatively cheap fossil fuels. Oil and gas, not coal, are the driving forces behind any growth in the local and world economies. Banks rely on economic growth to exist.We need to educate our young people and prepare for a low-energy future - now!
